ygData.subject: Re: Shadow vortex
ygData.msgSnippet: ive been using it a while.  dont know if it works (it seems to, ive heard it didnt for a while)  but it lowers ac.  i cast it so my pet can do more dmg. cast
ygData.messageBody:
ive been using it a while. dont know if it works (it seems to, ive heard it
didnt for a while) but it lowers ac. i cast it so my pet can do more dmg.
cast this before dots, etc, because ive noticed if i have some dots going
casting this will cause the mob to frenzy on my little necro butt.

belphenor


>From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
>Hm...another random question..
>Could anybody tell me what shadow vortex actually
>does?
>I have run across several discussions and it seems
>that it does something like 50pts dd damage and lowers
>the AC by around 18? Is that it? Or am I completly
>crazy?
>Thanks!
>
>Darkmoon Somberlight 20th Circle necromancer
